subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Go to the source?

Frank, 
 
I would be very interested in seeing what A & E has to say about =
 Paranormal 
States.  From what I have seen of the show, and it has only be=
en  (2) 30 
minute episodes, it looked all staged.  And when the second epi=
sode  was done I sat 
there laughing my ass off at the results.  They didn'=
t  address the issues 
correctly and handle it anywhere near how it should =
of been  done.  I guess 
according to A & E that if we are talking to the s=
pirit  of the dead then WE are 
the problem and should stop it or atleast t=
hat is how  they addressed it.  Or 
is just how I see it?  But they do have=
 a lot  of nice toys to play with, I 
will give them that.  I think I would=
 much  rather watch a made-for-tv 
documentary on the haunted piano than wa=
tch another  episode of Paranormal 
States........LOL
 
Jeff
 
 
In a messa=
ge dated 2/5/2008 1:39:58 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@liv=
e.com writes:

 
 
 
I e-mailed A&E asking if it's real or not. (paranormal=
  state). Now I wish I 
had the group e-mail on so I could see if anyone  c=
ared. The e-mail is a bit 
much to look at during the day, at work, and too=
  tempting to e-mail all day 
long.  

Frank-eats-his-Fran
